UART SVT UVM Documentation - Sequence Page

svt_sequence class inheritance diagram.

Sequences defined in UART SVT UVM Documentation:

Sequence Group Sequence Subgroup Sequences Sequences Description Controls Sequencer
DTE_COMPLEX_SEQUENCES_OF_SINGLE_TYPE
* This group contains all complex level sequences.
DTE_BUFF_FLUSH_DELAY_WITH_BREAK_COND
* This group contain configured buffer flush delay with packet generation and break condtion sequence.
 svt_uart_dte_buffer_flush_delay_with_break_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts buffer flush and inter cycle delay and also transmits packets.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured buffer flush and inter cycle delay. Values of packet count,
    buffer flush delay and inter cycle delay are constrained to local_packet_count, local_buffer_flush_delay and
    local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.

  • Execute sequence to generate break condition. Value of packet count is constrained to local_packet_count.
inter_cycle_delay
Inter cycle delay

buffer_flush_delay
Buffer flush delay

packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DTE_INTR_CYCLE_DELAY_WITH_PKT_GEN_AND_BREAK_COND
* This group contain configured inter cycle delay with packet generation and break condtion sequence.
 svt_uart_dte_inter_cycle_delay_with_break_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts inter cycle delay and also transmits packets.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured inter cycle delay. Values of packet count and
    inter cycle delay are constrained to local_packet_count and local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.

  • Execute sequence to generate break condition. Value of packet count is constrained to local_packet_count_second_cmd.
inter_cycle_delay
Inter cycle delay

packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DTE_PRIMITIVE_SEQUENCES
* This group contains all primitive level sequences.
DTE_RANDOM_GENERATION
* This group contain random sequence.
 svt_uart_dte_random_sequence This sequence generates random DTE transactions. sequence_length
Number of Transactions in a sequence.

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DTE_HARDWARE_RTS_DELAY_WITH_PKT_GEN
* This group contain configured rts cycle delay with packet generation hardware handshaking sequence.
 svt_uart_dte_hard_handshake_delay_rts_packet_gen_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts delay on Request To Send (RTS) signal, inter cycle delay
and also transmits packets, in case of Hardware Handshaking

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured RTS signal and inter cycle delay. Values of packet count,
    rts delay and inter cycle delay are constrained to local_packet_count, local_delay_rts and
    local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.

  • Set and drive Data Terminal Ready (DSR) signal value.
inter_cycle_delay
Inter cycle delay

delay_rts
request to send delay

packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DTE_BUFF_FLUSH_AND_INTR_CYCLE_DELAY_WITH_PKT_GEN
* This group contain configured buffer flush and inter cycle delay with packet generation sequence.
 svt_uart_dte_buffer_flush_and_inter_cycle_delay_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts buffer flush delay, inter cycle delay and also transmits packets.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured buffer flush and inter cycle delay. Values of packet count,
    buffer flush delay and inter cycle delay are constrained with local_packet_count, local_buffer_flush_delay and
    local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.
inter_cycle_delay
Inter cycle delay

buffer_flush_delay
Buffer flush delay

packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DTE_DRV_DTR
* This group contain driving the user provided values on DTR pin and controling transmission of packets sequence.
 svt_uart_dte_drive_dtr_sequence This sequence creates scenario which drives user provided values on DTR pin and also controls transmission of packets

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence by controlling generation of packets using enable_packet_generation with driving user specified values on DSR pin
    using drive_dtr_signal and dtr_signal_value. Value of packet count is constrained to local_packet_count attribute.
packet_count
Packet count

drive_dtr_signal
For Controling the driving of DTR pin

dtr_signal_value
Specifies the value to be assigned to DTR pin

enable_packet_generation
Controls generation of packets

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DTE_PKT_GEN
* This group contain packet generation sequence.
 svt_uart_dte_packet_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts inter cycle delay between packets and also transmits these packets

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured inter cycle delay. Values of packet count, inter cycle delay
    are constrained to local_packet_count, local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.
inter_cycle_delay
Inter cycle delay

packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DTE_BREAK_COND
* This group contain break condition sequence.
 svt_uart_dte_break_cond_sequence This sequence creates a scenario for generating break condition from DTE.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attribute

  • Receives value of local attribute of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized value.

  • Execute sequence to generate break condition with packet_count
    constrained to local_packet_count attribute.
packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_COMPLEX_SEQUENCES_OF_SINGLE_TYPE
* This group contains all complex level sequences.
DCE_BUFF_FLUSH_DELAY_WITH_BREAK_COND
* This group contain configured buffer flush delay with packet generation and break condtion sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_buffer_flush_delay_with_break_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts buffer flush and inter cycle delay and also transmits packets.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured buffer flush and inter cycle delay. Values of packet count,
    buffer flush delay and inter cycle delay are constrained to local_packet_count, local_buffer_flush_delay and
    local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.

  • Execute sequence to generate break condition. Value of packet count is constrained to local_packet_count attribute.
inter_cycle_delay
Inter cycle delay

buffer_flush_delay
Buffer flush delay

packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_HARDWARE_CTS_DELAY_ONLY_AND_BUFF_FLUSH_DELAY_WITH_PKT_GEN
* This group contain configured cts cycle delay without packet generation and configured buffer flush delay hardware handshaking sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_hardware_handshake_delay_on_cts_without_packets_and_buffer_flush_delay_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts delay on Clear To Send by disabling packet generation from DCE,
inserts buffer flush and inter cycle delay and also transmits packets,in case of Hardware Handshaking.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence with configured CTS signal delay. Values of cts delay
    is constrained to local_delay_cts.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured buffer flush and inter cycle delay. Values of packet count,
    buffer flush delay and inter cycle delay are constrained to local_packet_count, local_buffer_flush_delay and
    local_inter_cycle_delay respectively.
delay_cts
clear to send delay

inter_cycle_delay
Inter cycle delay

buffer_flush_delay
Buffer flush delay

packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_SOFTWARE_SEND_XOFF_XON_WITH_PKT_GEN_CONFG_BUFF_FLUSH_AND_INTR_CYCLE_DELAYS
* This group contain send XOFF-XON with packet generation and configured buffer flush and inter cycle delay software handshaking sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_soft_handshake_packet_transaction_with_xoff_xon_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts buffer flush and inter cycle delay and also transmits XON and XOFF packets,
in case of Software Handshaking.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured buffer flush and inter cycle delay. Values of packet count,
    buffer flush delay and inter cycle delay are constrained to local_packet_count, local_buffer_flush_delay and
    local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured inter cycle delay. Values of packet count and
    inter cycle delay are constrained with local_packet_count and local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.

  • Execute XON and XOFF sequence, which verifies that DTE must not send any packet in between XOFF and XON packet.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured buffer flush and inter cycle delay. Values of packet count,
    buffer flush delay and inter cycle delay are constrained to local_packet_count, local_buffer_flush_delay and
    local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.
inter_cycle_delay
Inter cycle delay

buffer_flush_delay
Buffer flush delay

packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_SOFTWARE_SEND_XOFF_XON_WITH_PKT_GEN_AND_BUFF_FLUSH_DELAY
* This group contain send XOFF-XON with packet generation and configured buffer flush delay software handshaking sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_soft_handshake_buffer_flush_with_xoff_xon_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts buffer flush delay and also transmits XON and XOFF packet,
in case of Software Handshaking.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured buffer flush and inter cycle delay. Values of packet count,
    buffer flush delay and inter cycle delay are constrained to local_packet_count, local_buffer_flush_delay and
    local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.

  • Execute XON and XOFF sequence, which verifies that DTE must not send any packet in between XOFF and XON packet.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured inter cycle delay. Values of packet count and inter cycle delay
    are constrained to local_packet_count and local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.
inter_cycle_delay
Inter cycle delay

buffer_flush_delay
Buffer flush delay

packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_SOFTWARE_SEND_XOFF_XON_WITH_PKT_GEN
* This group contain send XOFF-XON with packet generation software handshaking sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_soft_handshake_packet_with_xoff_xon_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts inter cycle delay and also transmits XON and XOFF packet,
in case of Software Handshaking.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured inter cycle delay. Values of packet count and
    inter cycle delay are constrained to local_inter_cycle_delay and local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.

  • Execute XON and XOFF sequence, which verifies that DTE must not send any packet in between XOFF and XON packet.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured inter cycle delay. Values of packet count and inter cycle delay
    are constrained to local_inter_cycle_delay and local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.
inter_cycle_delay
Inter cycle delay

packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_HARDWARE_CTS_DELAY_WITHOUT_PKT_GEN
* This group contain configured cts cycle delay without packet generation hardware handshaking sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_hard_handshake_delay_cts_without_packet_gen_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts delay on Clear To Send by disabling packet generation from DCE,
in case of Hardware Handshaking

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured CTS signal delay. Values of cts delay
    is constrained to local_delay_cts attribute.
delay_cts
clear to send delay

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_HARDWARE_CTS_DELAY_WITH_PKT_GEN
* This group contain configured cts cycle delay with packet generation hardware handshaking sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_hard_handshake_delay_cts_packet_gen_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts delay on Clear To Send (CTS) signal, inter cycle delay
and also transmits packets, in case of Hardware Handshaking

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured CTS signal and inter cycle delay. Values of packet count,
    cts delay and inter cycle delay are constrained to local_packet_count, local_delay_cts and
    local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.
inter_cycle_delay

delay_cts
clear to send delay

packet_count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_BUFF_FLUSH_AND_INTR_CYCLE_DELAY_WITH_PKT_GEN
* This group contain configured buffer flush and inter cycle delay with packet generation sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_buffer_flush_and_inter_cycle_delay_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts buffer flush delay, inter cycle delay and also transmits packets.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured buffer flush and inter cycle delay. Values of packet count,
    buffer flush delay and inter cycle delay are constrained to local_packet_count, local_buffer_flush_delay and
    local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_DRV_DSR
* This group contain driving the user provided values on DSR pin and controling transmission of packets sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_drive_dsr_sequence This sequence creates scenario which drives user provided values on DSR pin and also controls transmission of packets

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence by controlling generation of packets using enable_packet_generation with driving user specified values on DSR pin
    using drive_dsr_signal and dsr_signal_value. Value of packet count is constrained to local_packet_count attribute.

dsr_signal_value

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_PKT_GEN
* This group contain packet generation sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_packet_sequence This sequence creates scenario which inserts inter cycle delay between packets and also transmits these packets
in case of Software Handshaking.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Execute sequence to generate packets with configured inter cycle delay. Values of packet count, inter cycle delay
    are constrained to local_packet_count, local_inter_cycle_delay attributes respectively.
inter_cycle_delay
Inter cycle delay

packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_SOFTWARE_SEND_XOFF_XON
* This group contain send XOFF-XON software handshaking sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_soft_handshake_send_xoff_xon_sequence This sequence creates a scenario to only send xoff and xon packets after
disabling packet generation from DCE in case of Software Handshaking.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Execute XOFF generation from DCE

  • Wait for XOFF to appear on bus

  • Execute XON generation from DCE after delay.

  • Check for data in between XOFF and XON packet and if data is recieved between them, flash error
 -- svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
DCE_BREAK_COND
* This group contain break condition sequence.
 svt_uart_dce_break_cond_sequence This sequence creates a scenario for generating break condition from DCE.

Body of the sequence executes following set of commands

  • Declares its local attribute

  • Receives value of local attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized value.

  • Execute sequence to generate break condition with packet_count
    constrained to local_packet_count attribute.
packet_count
Packet count

svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
default -- svt_gpio_base_sequence Description-Unavailable -- svt_gpio_sequencer
svt_uart_dce_base_sequence This sequence raises/drops objections in the pre/post_body so that root sequences raise objections but subsequences do not. -- svt_uart_transaction_sequencer
svt_uart_dte_base_sequence This sequence raises/drops objections in the pre/post_body so that root sequences raise objections but subsequences do not. --
